TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComparable`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IComparable

span.span: The type of object to compare.

summary.span: 定义由值类型或类实现的通用比较方法，以为排序实例创建类型特定的比较方法。

span.span: Defines a generalized comparison method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific comparison method for ordering or sorting its instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由可排序其值类型实现，提供强类型的比较方法以进行排序的泛型集合对象的成员。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted and provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 例如，一个数可能会大于第二个数字，并且一个字符串可以出现在另一个之前的按字母顺序。For example, one number can be larger than a second number, and one string can appear in alphabetical order before another. 它需要实现的类型定义一个方法， ，，该值指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是否在之前，之后，还是与相同类型的第二个对象相同。It requires that implementing types define a single method, , that indicates whether the position of the current instance in the sort order is before, after, or the same as a second object of the same type. 通常情况下，直接从开发人员代码不调用方法。Typically, the method is not called directly from developer code. 相反，它由自动方法如和。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 通常，所提供的类型实现还实现接口。Typically, types that provide an implementation also implement the interface. 接口定义方法，这可确定的相等性的实现类型实例。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 实现方法必须返回，有三个值之一下, 表中所示。The implementation of the method must return an that has one of three values, as shown in the following table. |“值”Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |小于零Less than zero|此对象之前指定的对象在排序顺序的方法。This object precedes the object specified by the method in the sort order.| |零Zero|此当前实例在排序顺序中作为指定的对象的同一位置中发生方法自变量。This current instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as the object specified by the method argument.| |大于零Greater than zero|此当前实例遵循指定的对象在排序顺序的方法自变量。This current instance follows the object specified by the method argument in the sort order.| 所有数值类型 (如和) 实现，这一点与， ，和。All numeric types (such as and ) implement , as do , , and . 自定义类型还应提供自己实现使对象实例排序或排序。Custom types should also provide their own implementation of to enable object instances to be ordered or sorted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现作为一个简单`Temperature`对象。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 该示例创建字符串与集合`Temperature`对象键，并将记录了天气和字符串的若干个对添加到列表顺序不正确。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在调用方法，集合使用实现进行排序的列表项，然后显示递增温度的顺序。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 替换的类型参数实现此接口的类型的接口。

span.span: Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface.

para.span: 如果你实现，应该重载， ， ，和运算符返回值与相一致。

span.span: If you implement , you should overload the , , , and operators to return values that are consistent with .
In addition, you should also implement .

para.span: 请参阅文章的完整信息。

span.span: See the article for complete information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(!T other) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (other As T) As Integer

param.name: other
param.span: 与此实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 将当前实例与同一类型的另一个对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

span.span: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.

returns.span: 一个值，指示要比较的对象的相对顺序。

span.span: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.
The return value has these meanings:

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中位于 之前。
This instance precedes in the sort order.
此实例在排序顺序中与 的位置相同。
This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
此实例在排序顺序中位于 之后。
This instance follows in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供强类型的比较方法以进行排序的泛型集合对象的成员。 provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 因此，它通常不调用直接从开发人员代码。Because of this, it is usually not called directly from developer code. 相反，它由自动方法如和。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 此方法只是一个定义，必须实现的特定的类或值类型，才能生效。This method is only a definition and must be implemented by a specific class or value type to have effect. 部分 （"之前"、"发生在同一个位置"，而"遵循） 依赖于特定实现的返回值中指定的比较的含义。The meaning of the comparisons specified in the Return Values section ("precedes", "occurs in the same position as", and "follows) depends on the particular implementation. 根据定义，任何对象相比较大于`null`，两个 null 引用的比较结果为彼此相等。By definition, any object compares greater than `null`, and two null references compare equal to each other. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现作为一个简单`Temperature`对象。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 该示例创建字符串与集合`Temperature`对象键，并将记录了天气和字符串的若干个对添加到列表顺序不正确。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在调用方法，集合使用实现进行排序的列表项，然后显示递增温度的顺序。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 对于对象 A、 B 和 C，必须满足以下条件：

span.span: For objects A, B, and C, the following must be true:
A.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果A.CompareTo(B)返回零，则B.CompareTo(A)需要返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果A.CompareTo(B)返回零和B.CompareTo(C)返回零，则A.CompareTo(C)需要返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero and B.CompareTo(C) returns zero, then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果A.CompareTo(B)返回非零，一个值则B.CompareTo(A)需要返回值为符号相反。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value other than zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return a value of the opposite sign.

para.span: 如果A.CompareTo(B)返回一个值不等于零，和B.CompareTo(C)返回一个值相同的符号的，然后a。CompareTo(C)返回相同的符号的值所需和。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value that is not equal to zero, and B.CompareTo(C) returns a value of the same sign as , then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return a value of the same sign as and .

para.span: 使用方法来确定的类的实例排序。

span.span: Use the method to determine the ordering of instances of a class.
